entries.source: If the provided annotation target is not found, Annotator will try prepending this string to the path. This can be useful if, for example, all your notes are located at a specific remote location.
entries.translated: If the provided annotation target is not found, Annotator will try prepending this string to the path. This can be useful if, for example, all your notes are located at a specific remote location.

entries.source: Base font size in percents. Current: 100%
entries.translated: Base font size in percents. Current: 100%

entries.source: Whether to use annotation mode by default when opening a note with annotation-target
entries.translated: Whether to use annotation mode by default when opening a note with annotation-target

entries.source: Whether to include the %%PREFIX%% region of the annotation markdown. Allows you to see some text before the highlighted region.
entries.translated: Whether to include the %%PREFIX%% region of the annotation markdown. Allows you to see some text before the highlighted region.

entries.source: Whether to include the %%POSTFIX%% region of the annotation markdown. Allows you to see some text after the highlighted region.
entries.translated: Whether to include the %%POSTFIX%% region of the annotation markdown. Allows you to see some text after the highlighted region.

entries.source: Whether to wrap the %%HIGHLIGHT%% region text in == ==, so that the text becomes highlighted. Useful for distinguishing the highlight from the pre- and postfix.
entries.translated: Whether to wrap the %%HIGHLIGHT%% region text in == ==, so that the text becomes highlighted. Useful for distinguishing the highlight from the pre- and postfix.

entries.source: Whether to use dark mode by default when opening pdfs/epubs.
entries.translated: Whether to use dark mode by default when opening pdfs/epubs.

entries.source: The amount of sepia in dark mode
entries.translated: The amount of sepia in dark mode

entries.source: The amount of contrast in dark mode
entries.translated: The amount of contrast in dark mode

entries.source: The amount of brightness in dark mode
entries.translated: The amount of brightness in dark mode

entries.source: Not bundled with the plugin due to potential copyright issues.
entries.translated: Not bundled with the plugin due to potential copyright issues.

entries.source: If this is enabled, more things are printed to the console.
entries.translated: If this is enabled, more things are printed to the console.
